Our Services

output.content:
Our Campaigns & Community Programs
Over the years, SKAI Trust has launched powerful awareness campaigns and outreach programs that educate, inspire, and empower tribal and rural communities. Our work continues in the field every day. You can explore our past programs below and get in touch to collaborate or volunteer with us on upcoming initiatives.

steps.description: Extract the main heading and summary content.

output.content:
Main page heading: Highlights Gallery

Short summary: The page showcases various community welfare and health initiatives by SKAI Trust, including medical camps, blanket drives, awareness programs, and distribution of essentials in tribal and rural areas of Tamil Nadu such as Kolli Hills, Yercaud, and Namakkal District. The initiatives focus on promoting wellness, preventive care, and support for tribal communities through free health checkups, awareness campaigns, and distribution of food, fruits, and stationery to school children.

steps.description: Extract the main heading and summary content.

output.content:
Terms of Service
Effective Date: September 17, 2025

Welcome to SRI KOLLIAMMAN INTERNATIONAL TRUST (SKAI Trust). These Terms of Service govern your use of our website, mobile medical outreach programs, and any related services. By accessing our site or using our services, you agree to these Terms.

SKAI Trust provides mobile medical services to tribal communities in Kolli Hills (Namakkal) and Yercaud (Salem). Our services include haemoglobinopathy screening, antenatal and postnatal follow-up, medical camps (dental, eye, diabetic, hypertension, general), awareness campaigns (HIV/AIDS, family planning, preventing child marriage, reducing MMR and IMR), and distribution of medicines, vitamins, vaccines, and lab tests.

Our programs are intended primarily for outreach communities in Tamil Nadu. Users must comply with applicable laws when using our services or interacting with this website.

Responsibilities include accurate information provision by users and service delivery by our medical team in line with government and National Health Mission standards.

SKAI Trust does not guarantee outcomes; the website is for awareness and outreach only and should not replace consultation with a licensed medical professional.

Terms may be updated periodically; continued use constitutes acceptance of updates.

Contact for questions: skaitrust@gmail.com

steps.description: Extract the main heading and summary content.

output.content:
Privacy Policy

SRI KOLLIAMMAN INTERNATIONAL TRUST (SKAI Trust) is committed to protecting the privacy of individuals, especially the tribal communities served in Kolli Hills and Yercaud. This Privacy Policy outlines how SKAI Trust collects, uses, and safeguards personal and health-related information gathered during outreach medical programs. The information collected includes basic details, health records, and contact details, which are used to provide medical services, organize health awareness campaigns, and comply with reporting standards. Individuals have rights to access, update, or request deletion of their data by contacting SKAI Trust.
